description: Single-storey rear/side wraparound extension; single-storey side extension (following partial demolition of existing side-extension); alteration of roof from hip to gable end; roof extension to rear of main roofslope; installation of three rooflights to front roofslope; alterations to roof involving installation of flue pipe and replacing concrete tiles with grey slate tiles; alterations to rear and side fenestrations involving infilling and replacing window openings, and forming a Juliet balcony; and alterations to rear garden involving removal of a tree and resurfacing of patio
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the drawing: PA3-001; PA3-002; PA3-203 Rev. A; PA3-210 Rev. A; PA3-211 Rev. A; PA3-212; PA3-220 Rev. A; PA3-221 Rev. A; PA3-222 Rev. A.

REASON: For avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match or complement the appearance of those of the original dwellinghouse and shall be consistent with those as listed on the drawings / plans as listed in Condition 2.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the existing building and surrounding area in accordance with the Creffield Conservation Area Management Plan (2007) and policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7.8 of the London Plan (2016); 1.1 and 1.2 of the Local Development Framework (Core) Strategy (2012); and 7B, 7C and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan (2013). | No part of any roof shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

REASON: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties in accordance with policies 7.6 of the London Plan (2016); and 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013). | The rooflights shown in dwgs. PA-203 Rev. A, PA-211 Rev. A, and PA-220 Rev. A of the Approved Plans shall be of a conservation-style and so maintained.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the existing building and surrounding area in accordance with the Creffield Conservation Area Management Plan (2007) and policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7.8 of the London Plan (2016); 1.1 and 1.2 of the Local Development Framework (Core) Strategy (2012); and 7B, 7C and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan (2013).
